GridViewCellAutomationPeer Class

Definition

Exposes the cells in a GridView to UI Automation.

In this Article

public class GridViewCellAutomationPeer : System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableItemProvider

Methods

GetAutomationControlTypeCore()

Gets the control type for the element that is associated with this GridViewCellAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*.

protected override System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType GetAutomationControlTypeCore ();
Returns
AutomationControlType

If this GridViewCellAutomationPeer is associated with a TextBlock element, this method returns AutomationControlType; otherwise, this method returns AutomationControlType.

GetClassNameCore()

Gets the name of the element that is associated with this GridViewCellAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*.

protected override string GetClassNameCore ();
Returns
String

The name of the element.

GetPattern(PatternInterface)

Gets the control pattern for the element that is associated with this GridViewCellAutomationPeer.

public override object GetPattern (System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface);
Parameters
patternInterface
PatternInterface

One of the enumeration values.

Returns
Object

If patternInterface is PatternInterface or PatternInterface, this method returns the current GridViewCellAutomationPeer.

IsControlElementCore()

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this GridViewCellAutomationPeer is understood by the end user as interactive or the user might understand the element as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the GUI. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*.

protected override bool IsControlElementCore ();
Returns
Boolean

If this GridViewCellAutomationPeer is associated with a TextBlock element, this method returns true; otherwise, this method returns a list of child elements.

Explicit Interface Implementations

IGridItemProvider.Column

Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.

int System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.Column { get; }
Returns
Int32

A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the GridViewCellAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IGridItemProvider interface.

IGridItemProvider.ColumnSpan

Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.

int System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.ColumnSpan { get; }
Returns
Int32

The number of columns spanned.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the GridViewCellAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IGridItemProvider interface.

IGridItemProvider.ContainingGrid

Gets a UI Automation provider that implements GridPattern and represents the container of the cell or item.

System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.ContainingGrid { get; }
Returns
IRawElementProviderSimple

A UI Automation provider that implements the GridPattern and represents the cell or item container.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the GridViewCellAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IGridItemProvider interface.

IGridItemProvider.Row

Gets the ordinal number of the row that contains the cell or item.

int System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.Row { get; }
Returns
Int32

A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the row containing the cell or item.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the GridViewCellAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IGridItemProvider interface.

IGridItemProvider.RowSpan

Gets the number of rows spanned by a cell or item.

int System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.RowSpan { get; }
Returns
Int32

The number of rows spanned.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the GridViewCellAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IGridItemProvider interface.

ITableItemProvider.GetColumnHeaderItems()

Retrieves a collection of UI Automation providers that represent all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.

System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] ITableItemProvider.GetColumnHeaderItems ();
Returns
IRawElementProviderSimple[]

A collection of UI Automation providers.

ITableItemProvider.GetRowHeaderItems()

Retrieves a collection of UI Automation providers that represent all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.

System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] ITableItemProvider.GetRowHeaderItems ();

IRawElementProviderSimple[]

A collection of UI Automation providers.

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the GridViewCellAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ITableItemProvider interface.
